name: AVAL_AIUD_TRANS_ISSUE_DETAIL
body_snippet:
TRIGGER "SGDGROUP".AVAL_AIUD_TRANS_ISSUE_DETAIL
  after insert OR UPDATE OR DELETE on TRANS_ISSUE_DETAIL




declare
  -- local variables here
begin

  -- this code is added by tariq
  -- the trigger must not fire when the data
  -- is replicated from another site
  if pckg_replication.get_trigger_status = 0 then
     return;
  end if;
  ------------------------------------------
 


  PCKG_INV.VALUATE_PENDING_ITEMS();

end ;
